name: Pumpkinfall
description:
A giant evil pumpkin is falling! The only way to stop it is to find 5 randomly placed Cauldrons in a cemetery and get rid of them before it gets too close, but look out for the possessed jack-o-lanterns! If they see you, quickly pull down your mask and stay put until they move on!

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Get rid of Cauldron

Space - Pull down mask

--- CREDITS ---

https://www.freesoundeffects.com/

Spacial Winds - Kevin Macleod  (Menu theme)

Hills - TobyFredson

Pumpkins, Tombstones, fences, lantern - Lumo-Art 3D
